title: Blue Whales: Giant Mammals
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,111 words, Level R (Grade 3), Lexile 970L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     H and Z
description: As the largest animals on Earth, Blue whales are amazing. Students will not only learn about their size, but also how they breathe, what they eat, where they lives, and how they communicate. Colorful photographs support the text.
